verses.name: Ezra 5:9
verses.text: Then asked we those elders, and said unto them thus, Who commanded you to build this house, and to make up these walls?

verses.name: Ezra 5:10
verses.text: We asked their names also, to certify thee, that we might write the names of the men that were the chief of them.

verses.name: Ezra 5:11
verses.text: And thus they returned us answer, saying, We are the servants of the God of heaven and earth, and build the house that was builded these many years ago, which a great king of Israel builded and set up.
